name: Fried Squash Blossoms
author: feebz7
summary: Pick the flowers off your zucchini plants as soon as you see some zucchini has started to come in under the flower. A very tasty treat! Try stuffing the blossoms with goat cheese before frying them!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper, to taste
directions: Gently dip zucchini blossoms in beaten egg and shake off the excess
Press into flour; coat with bread crumbs
Place breaded blossoms on a plate; do not stack
Heat olive oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat
Fry blossoms, working in batches, until both sides are golden brown, about 5 minutes each side
Season with salt and black pepper
